title: Michelle Donelan – 2022 Comments on the Dismissal of Kwasi Kwarteng
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Michelle Donelan, the Secretary of State for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport on Twitter on 14 October 2022.
content:
Prime Minister Liz Truss has listened and acted decisively today to ensure that our vitally important plan to protect jobs and grow the economy goes ahead. We must come together and focus on delivering.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
